TitleEnglish: The Vampire Dies in No Time
SummaryEnglish: Vampires are said to have many weaknesses such as garlic, crosses, and sunlight. Game-loving vampire lord Draluc just so happens to be weak to... everything. He dies, turning into a pile of ash, at the slightest shock. When his castle is destroyed, he teams up with Vampire Hunter Ronaldo, much to the other's chagrin. Despite their differences, they must try to work together to defend themselves from rogue vampires, Ronaldo's murderous editor, investigators, and more—with Draluc dying continuously along the way.

1.TitleEnglish: The Hunter Comes and Flies in the Sky / The Idiot, the Convenience Store, and Impermanence
1.SummaryEnglish: Vampire Slayer Ronaldo is hired to rescue a boy who was seen entering Castle Draluc, but the vampire waiting there is not what he imagined.

2.TitleEnglish: Assault! Mr. Fukuma / Falling Like Flowers in Shin-Yokohama / Can a Bang on the Wall Kill Him?
2.SummaryEnglish: Ronaldo's editor wants the manuscript for the second volume of Ronaldo's War Chronicles, but Ronaldo hasn't finished.

3.TitleEnglish: Highway to Success, Path to Failure / Ridiculous Hunter Guild / More Ridiculous Hunter Guild
3.SummaryEnglish: Hinaichi follows Draluc to see if she can uncover his secret, and Ronaldo introduces Draluc to the Hunters Guild.

4.TitleEnglish: I Have Desire, Therefore I Metamorphose / Kitchen Liberal Force / The Man's Name Is Handa
4.SummaryEnglish: Mischief occurs when rare creatures and old acquaintances go to Ronaldo's agency.

5.TitleEnglish: The Longest Day of Tsujigiri Nagiri / Cats Are Cute / Handa, Day Off, History
5.SummaryEnglish: The Hunter Guild works with the Vampire Control Division to find the vampire Tsujigiri Nagiri.

6.TitleEnglish: Tale of the Empress's Birth / Draluc's Family / Draluc's Family, Continued
6.SummaryEnglish: A Vampire Empress is born and Ronaldo meets the Draluc family at the annual New Year's Eve party.

7.TitleEnglish: Lewd Talk-a-Talk-Talk-Talk / Tou Handa's Terrible Day Off / And Then Comes Father
7.SummaryEnglish: In Shin-Yokohama a new vampire appears with a series of perversities in his powers, which causes chaos and confusion.

8.TitleEnglish: The Bat's Close Call / Kidnap Capriccio / Kidnap Elegy
8.SummaryEnglish: Draluc transforms into a bat and goes on an adventure, and John goes out by himself in the midst of a string of kidnappings.

9.TitleEnglish: Citizen Baseball Kane / The Left Hand of Iron Is Kind of Boring / Emperor of the Shore
9.SummaryEnglish: Vampires and baseball fist lovers challenge people to baseball fists with advanced technology that manipulates hypnosis and barriers at the same time. Since it is not possible to refuse the game that was set up when entering the barrier, vampire extermination people who have been in battle are also taken off one after another, and Doralck and Ronald are also involved.

10.TitleEnglish: The Festival Music Calls You / Heisei Annoying Vampire Battle in Shin-Yoko / Draluc's All Night Shin-Yoko
10.SummaryEnglish: Yomotsuzaka, the director of the "Vampire Research Center (VRC)", is a vampire researcher who is famous as a great genius. Ronald and his friends, suddenly summoned by him, are ordered to capture the vampires who have escaped from the center. The fleeing vampire was a parasite-type nasty opponent with a strong fascinating pheromone.

11.TitleEnglish: Shin-Yoko Battle Royale / John meets Draluc / Waiting for LOVE
11.SummaryEnglish: Uncle Y and Yakyuken lovers joined hands to create a huge Y-dan barrier in Shin-Yokohama. Weapons and strengths do not work at all within the barrier, and Y talk is the power. Ronald laments his powerlessness in the face of the powerful enemies that appear one after another.

12.TitleEnglish: Silver Rise Blind Your Eyes / Dress Up for You / Five Dumb Matches
12.SummaryEnglish: My favorite game console has broken. Doralck and Ronald will play "Which will buy the new game console?" In order to be fair, the two of them decided to play the fifth game by drawing a lottery that wrote the game method on paper. Where is the game?

2.SummaryEnglish: There's a new vampire hunter in town, Hinaichi comes for a visit, and Draluc reviews a game.

3.SummaryEnglish: Autumn Books editor and Ronaldo fan, Sanzu, shows up at Ronaldo's office, Sagyo gets caught up in Handa's schemes, and Tsujigiri Nagiri meets his match?

4.TitleEnglish: Minding the Guild with a Suspicious Person
4.SummaryEnglish: Yakyuken Lover comes back to play again, and Draluc wakes up one night in a child's body.

5.SummaryEnglish: Bosatsu goes to work with Fukuma, Satetsu gets used as a test subject, and Ronaldo gets stuck in a mysterious space.

6.SummaryEnglish: Ronaldo tells Draluc about his brother, his brother comes to visit, and Ronaldo almost misses a deadline.

7.SummaryEnglish: Someone's after the socks of innocent vampires, Draus tries to fix Hinaichi, and John has an adventure at the VRC.

8.SummaryEnglish: A giant baby Nudenium is loose, Mr. Lewd Talk is friends with Handa's mother, and Mikazuki returns to Shin-Yokohama.

9.SummaryEnglish: Ronaldo and Draluc go into Bubuo's dream, Yakyuken Lover has a run-in with Koyuki's dad, and Draluc's grandfather visits Shin-Yokohama.

10.SummaryEnglish: A vampire makes everyone in Shin-Yokohama age backwards and Tsujigiri Nagiri and Kantaro meet again.

11.TitleEnglish: Please Suggest Warming Each Other Up
11.SummaryEnglish: Ronaldo, Hiyoshi, and Mikazuki are stuck in a blizzard with some vampires, Handa and Sanzu duke it out, and Draluc's old teacher comes to Shin-Yokohama.

12.TitleEnglish: Fun Stupid Guys in Shin-Yokohama Special ver.
12.SummaryEnglish: After the conclusion to the battle against Northdin, everyone goes to the hot springs.
